title: 11 Nordstrom Shoe Favorites, Including Half Yearly Sale Deals
description: Between the longer stretches of daylight and warmer weather, a summer shoe refresh can feel essential, and Nordstrom is one of our favorite retailers to start our search. With its vast selection ranging from Nordstrom brands to designer options, it's easy to find a pair that fits your style at a price you're comfortable spending. Plus, newly discount options are available for Nordstrom's Half Yearly Sale. After poring over the retailer's inventory, we're eyeing all of the shoes we can't wait to slip into. We've honed in on a variety of styles, including sneakers, sandals, wedding guest-friendly heels, and everything in between. If you're ready to give your shoe selection a summer refresh, browse our curated list of Nordstrom's most covetable shoe styles for the season.
author: Angela Elias
excerpt: We rounded up the best women's shoes money can buy at Nordstrom, from waterproof sandals and cute running shoes to chic mules and more.
text: While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Between the longer stretches of daylight and warmer weather, a summer shoe refresh can feel essential, and Nordstrom is one of our favorite retailers to start our search. With its vast selection ranging from Nordstrom brands to designer options, it's easy to find a pair that fits your style at a price you're comfortable spending. Plus, newly discount options are available for Nordstrom's Half Yearly Sale. After poring over the retailer's inventory, we're eyeing all of the shoes we can't wait to slip into. We've honed in on a variety of styles, including sneakers, sandals, wedding guest-friendly heels, and everything in between. If you're ready to give your shoe selection a summer refresh, browse our curated list of Nordstrom's most covetable shoe styles for the season.01nordstrom.comWaterproof Slide SandalsBirkenstock Madrid Big Buckle EVA Slide Sandal ($55) Whether you have a beach vacation on the books or need a go-to pair of sandals for pool days, this waterproof option is supportive, practical, and elevated. It comes in three colors, but the white option with the gold buckle feels especially chic and versatile.02nordstrom.comJelly MulesJeffrey Campbell Sea Glass Jelly Mule ($55) Jelly shoes are making a comeback, and these popular Jeffrey Campbell beauties strike the perfect balance between laidback comfort and sophistication. Crafted with a jelly upper that's soft and pliable, they're sleek, playful, and airy. There's an assortment of colors to choose from, but we're eyeing this clear option in particular.03nordstrom.comHeeled SandalsDolce Vita Becki Ankle Strap Sandal ($60, originally $100) Whether you're attending a wedding or just need a comfortable pair of heels to wear this summer, these ankle-strap cuties need to be on your radar. Between the crinkled silver leather, square-shaped toe bed, and ankle strap, they're minimal yet striking. With a two and a half inch heel, you also won't be dying to kick them off before the night is over. Right now, you can score them for 40 percent off, thanks to Nordstrom's half yearly sale.04nordstrom.comNeutral SneakersAdidas Gazelle Sneaker ($100) A classic that will never go out of style, these Adidas Gazelle sneakers look fabulous with everything from dresses to jeans. The pinkish tan hue is also a fantastic neutral if you want to deviate from black and gray.05nordstrom.comPointed FlatsBelle & Bloom On The Go Leather Flat ($150) Every wardrobe needs a pointed flat, but if you want something a bit bolder, the gold chain embellishment and strap have a jewelry-like effect that's perfect for pairing with everything from straight-leg trousers to denim. They come in a range of five different neutral shades, including three that are currently on sale.06nordstrom.comStudded SandalsBirkenstock Arizona Rivets Studded Slide Style ($150) If you gravitate towards the comfort of Birkenstocks but want an option that's more chic than crunchy, their latest Arizona style blends earthy suede with blinging studs. You can grab it in this taupe and silver option or a rust and gold version, depending on your metal preference.07nordstrom.comRunning SneakersOn Cloudnova 2 Sneaker ($160) If you're looking for a running shoe that has major cushioning, a lightweight sole, and is stylish enough to wear outside of the gym, these Cloudnova sneakers are definitely worth trying. They offer a soft landing, whether you're going for a run, walking, or enjoying a step class. Grab them in this neutral Ice/Sand palette, or in five other color combinations.08nordstrom.comWestern BootiesMiz Mooz Carlitos Western Bootie ($200) For a soft entry into the Western aesthetic, you can't go wrong with this bootie. It has a stacked heel, tonal stitching, and ankle height. It comes in eight colors, ranging from neutrals to bold colors, but we love this Brandy hue. They run a bit small, so you may want to go up a half size.09nordstrom.comToe-Loop SandalsVince Lukas Slide Sandal ($207, originally $295) If you're looking for a flat, neutral sandal that's comfortable but far from boring, this pair from Vince offers plenty of eye-catching details with its toe-ring and asymmetric strap. This Birch Sand color also happens to be 30 percent off for the half yearly sale.10nordstrom.comSheer MulesReformation Wilda Pointed Toe Kitten Mule ($278) Whether you're wearing them with your favorite pair of jeans or a sundress, these sheer mules will be the focal point. Between the angled kitten heel and the mesh, flower-adorned toe bed, they're dainty yet supportive and a must have for summer.11nordstrom.comPleated BootiesNeil J. Rodgers Plisse Ankle Boots ($895) Neil J. Rodgers recently became available at Nordstrom, and we're eyeing these pleated ankle boots. The shape and color is versatile enough to be worn with practically anything, but the individually hand-folded pleats crafted from soft Italian leather also make a statement. They're selling quickly, so snag them in your size before they're gone!-Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Between the longer stretches of daylight and warmer weather, a summer shoe refresh can feel essential, and Nordstrom is one of our favorite retailers to start our search. With its vast selection ranging from Nordstrom brands to designer options, it's easy to find a pair that fits your style at a price you're comfortable spending. Plus, newly discount options are available for Nordstrom's Half Yearly Sale. After poring over the retailer's inventory, we're eyeing all of the shoes we can't wait to slip into. We've honed in on a variety of styles, including sneakers, sandals, wedding guest-friendly heels, and everything in between. If you're ready to give your shoe selection a summer refresh, browse our curated list of Nordstrom's most covetable shoe styles for the season.

01

Waterproof Slide Sandals

Birkenstock Madrid Big Buckle EVA Slide Sandal ($55)

Whether you have a beach vacation on the books or need a go-to pair of sandals for pool days, this waterproof option is supportive, practical, and elevated. It comes in three colors, but the white option with the gold buckle feels especially chic and versatile.

02

Jelly Mules

Jeffrey Campbell Sea Glass Jelly Mule ($55)

Jelly shoes are making a comeback, and these popular Jeffrey Campbell beauties strike the perfect balance between laidback comfort and sophistication. Crafted with a jelly upper that's soft and pliable, they're sleek, playful, and airy. There's an assortment of colors to choose from, but we're eyeing this clear option in particular.

03

Heeled Sandals

Dolce Vita Becki Ankle Strap Sandal ($60, originally $100)

Whether you're attending a wedding or just need a comfortable pair of heels to wear this summer, these ankle-strap cuties need to be on your radar. Between the crinkled silver leather, square-shaped toe bed, and ankle strap, they're minimal yet striking. With a two and a half inch heel, you also won't be dying to kick them off before the night is over. Right now, you can score them for 40 percent off, thanks to Nordstrom's half yearly sale.

04

Neutral Sneakers

Adidas Gazelle Sneaker ($100)

A classic that will never go out of style, these Adidas Gazelle sneakers look fabulous with everything from dresses to jeans. The pinkish tan hue is also a fantastic neutral if you want to deviate from black and gray.

05

Pointed Flats

Belle & Bloom On The Go Leather Flat ($150)

Every wardrobe needs a pointed flat, but if you want something a bit bolder, the gold chain embellishment and strap have a jewelry-like effect that's perfect for pairing with everything from straight-leg trousers to denim. They come in a range of five different neutral shades, including three that are currently on sale.

06

Studded Sandals

Birkenstock Arizona Rivets Studded Slide Style ($150)

If you gravitate towards the comfort of Birkenstocks but want an option that's more chic than crunchy, their latest Arizona style blends earthy suede with blinging studs. You can grab it in this taupe and silver option or a rust and gold version, depending on your metal preference.

07

Running Sneakers

On Cloudnova 2 Sneaker ($160)

If you're looking for a running shoe that has major cushioning, a lightweight sole, and is stylish enough to wear outside of the gym, these Cloudnova sneakers are definitely worth trying. They offer a soft landing, whether you're going for a run, walking, or enjoying a step class. Grab them in this neutral Ice/Sand palette, or in five other color combinations.

08

Western Booties

Miz Mooz Carlitos Western Bootie ($200)

For a soft entry into the Western aesthetic, you can't go wrong with this bootie. It has a stacked heel, tonal stitching, and ankle height. It comes in eight colors, ranging from neutrals to bold colors, but we love this Brandy hue. They run a bit small, so you may want to go up a half size.

09

Toe-Loop Sandals

Vince Lukas Slide Sandal ($207, originally $295)

If you're looking for a flat, neutral sandal that's comfortable but far from boring, this pair from Vince offers plenty of eye-catching details with its toe-ring and asymmetric strap. This Birch Sand color also happens to be 30 percent off for the half yearly sale.

10

Sheer Mules

Reformation Wilda Pointed Toe Kitten Mule ($278)

Whether you're wearing them with your favorite pair of jeans or a sundress, these sheer mules will be the focal point. Between the angled kitten heel and the mesh, flower-adorned toe bed, they're dainty yet supportive and a must have for summer.

11

Pleated Booties

Neil J. Rodgers Plisse Ankle Boots ($895)

Neil J. Rodgers recently became available at Nordstrom, and we're eyeing these pleated ankle boots. The shape and color is versatile enough to be worn with practically anything, but the individually hand-folded pleats crafted from soft Italian leather also make a statement. They're selling quickly, so snag them in your size before they're gone!

Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.
